column4: heh - is there a program that offers functionality similar to iTunes...

change the sources.list to point to hoary

for the performance gain would it be worth it?
well considering you've probably taken more time thinking about it than it would to install :)
it also features a few things like >800mb ram support

not really -- I on;y format it once a year...
